page.name: Post-Course Self-Assessment
page.intro: Now, we'll take a moment to reflect by comparing what you know now with your knowledge before you started the course.
page.content:
Using your Self-Reflection and Activity Workbook, return to Activity 1: Pre-Course Self-Assessment you did at the beginning of the course.

In the “Post” column, enter a score to indicate the degree to which your understanding may have changed. You will use this information to plan your next steps.

Review the pre-/post-assessment scores on your self-assessment, together with the notes you took in your Self-Reflection and Activity Workbook. Consider, which principles stand out as areas you want to learn more about.
